main event: A white flash of light was observed moving from the west to east for 10-15 seconds.
interesting points: The object left a reddish trail half the size of itself,The cockpit of a C-47 was illuminated by the flash for 3-5 seconds,The maneuver indicated that it might be a fire-ball meteor,The report concluded the sighting could have been a balloon or aircraft,The observer described themselves as a 23-year-old male mail carrier.
witness description: mail carrier, U.S. Postal Service, age 23, male
